name: pixel-pipe
description: Pixel-Pipe: An AI-Powered Media Analysis Platform built on a serverless, event-driven architecture with AWS and Terraform.

scripts.build:get-upload-url: docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/var/task --entrypoint="" public.ecr.aws/lambda/nodejs:18 sh -c "npm install && npx esbuild src/handlers/get-upload-url.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/get-upload-url/index.js"
scripts.build:dispatch-tasks: docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/var/task --entrypoint="" public.ecr.aws/lambda/nodejs:18 sh -c "npm install && npx esbuild src/handlers/dispatch-tasks.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/dispatch-tasks/index.js"
scripts.build:resize-worker: docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/var/task --entrypoint="" public.ecr.aws/lambda/nodejs:18 sh -c "npm install && npx esbuild src/handlers/resize-worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:sharp --outfile=dist/resize-worker/index.js && cd dist/resize-worker && printf '{\"name\":\"resize-worker\",\"version\":\"1.0.0\",\"dependencies\":{\"sharp\":\"^0.34.3\"}}' > package.json && npm install"
scripts.build:analysis-worker: docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/var/task --entrypoint="" public.ecr.aws/lambda/nodejs:18 sh -c "npm install && npx esbuild src/handlers/analysis-worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/analysis-worker/index.js"
scripts.build: npm run build:get-upload-url && npm run build:dispatch-tasks && npm run build:resize-worker && npm run build:analysis-worker
